name: symfony-cmf/routing-auto
description: Component for automatically creating and managing routes for persisted objects

suggest.symfony/yaml: To be able to load Yaml configuration files (^2.1|3.*)
suggest.symfony-cmf/routing-auto-bundle: To integrate this lirbary with Symfony and the CMF
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: To use the EventDispatchingAdapter, allowing to edit the AutoRoute documents (^2.2|3.*)
